section-1.paragraph: The various news about me and my ongoing projects can be found in the Projects section of the website for more information.

card.title: Hello Dev World!
card.content: Enthusiastic full-stack developer with mastery across various technologies, eager to delve deeper into this ever-evolving universe. I am a versatile professional seeking new opportunities to leverage my technical skills and insatiable desire to explore and master emerging technologies.

github.paragraph: GitHub is a collaborative platform for developers. From web apps to utilities, these projects highlight my skills as a full-stack developer, showcasing my expertise across various technologies. I mainly use this platform for my projects.

section-1.title: My Projects
section-1.content: On this page you will find all the projects in which I have worked, whether alone or in collaboration with other developers.In this Page you can find all of my projects

card.title: EYE 4 TAP
card.content: An eye keyboard coordination game using eye tracking, you have to follow a screen split into 4 parts which flashes randomly and make as many points as possible.
